body_html: Probably magma's magma_sgemm_batched will be about as good as kepler's version, but it's a bit of a pain to integrate. The API is the same as cublasSgemmBatched, but it also requires magma_queue_t parameter, which is currently not created and maintained in THC state.
body_text: Probably magma's magma_sgemm_batched will be about  as good as kepler's version, but it's a bit of a pain to integrate. The API is the same as cublasSgemmBatched, but it also requires magma_queue_t parameter, which is currently not created and maintained in THC state.
body: Probably magma's magma_sgemm_batched will be about  as good as kepler's version, but it's a bit of a pain to integrate. The API is the same as cublasSgemmBatched, but it also requires magma_queue_t parameter, which is currently not created and maintained in THC state.
